text: Very friendly staff and hard working chef. Not a real Italian restaurant - processed pepperino slices - and mostly canned/bottled condiments. Reasonably priced but will not return.

Four first time visitors were more than pleasantly surprised. The filet of sole was excellent, as were the osso bucco and the veal. The service was a bit sketchy, but the owner/cook was enthousiastic and did an excellent job. Worth more than one visit!
Amazing thin crust pizza.  Very good pasta.  Owner takes pride in his restaurant.
